dict.string:
Ingredients:
1. 3 tbsp olive oil, 2 sweet potatoes, 2 tsp smoked paprika, 2 tsp ground cumin, 1 onion 2. 2 carrots, 2 celery sticks, 2 garlic cloves, 1-2 tsp chilli powder, 1 tsp dried oregano 3. 1 tbsp tomato purée, 1 red pepper, 2 x 400g cans chopped tomatoes, 400g can black beans, 400g can kidney beans, 4. lime wedges, guacamole, rice and coriander to serve
Recipe:
1. Heat the oven to 200C, Put the sweet potato in a roasting tin and drizzle over 1½ tbsp oil, 1 tsp smoked paprika and 1 tsp ground cumin. Mix and cook 25 mins 2. heat the remaining oil in a large saucepan over a medium heat. Add the onion, carrot and celery. Cook for 8-10 mins, then add crushed garlic, cook 1 mins 3. Add the remaining dried spices and tomato purée, cook 1 more min, then Add the red pepper, chopped tomatoes and 200ml water.Bring the chilli to a boil, then simmer for 20 mins. Tip in the beans and cook for another 10 mins 4. Season to taste then serve with lime wedges, guacamole, rice and coriander.
